events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th involving their vehicle and another driver at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords mentioning vehicle collision and car accident.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the investigation and follow up with the customer for further details.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer about the process and expected timeline.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver’s license to proceed with claim assessment.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the official police report and photographs of the accident area.
Initiated the investigation by reviewing submitted documents and verifying details with relevant authorities.
Completed the investigation confirming the third party’s fault and the extent of damage reported by the claimant.
Proposed a settlement amount covering the repair costs and rental car expenses during the repair period.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt handling of their claim.
Approved the claim as per the investigation outcome and settlement agreement with the customer.
Processed and issued payment to the claimant’s bank account to cover the vehicle repair and related expenses.
Closed the claim file after confirming receipt of payment and none further issues from the customer.
Archived the claim records for future reference and compliance with company record retention policies.
